item.title: 特朗普重启贸易战让谢因成为焦点
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对中国和其他国家征收的关税震撼了市场，给寻求上市的中国企业蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s tariffs on China and other countries are rocking markets and casting a pall over Chinese firms seeking to go public.】

item.title: 土耳其上月通胀率降至 42% 低于预期
item.description: 年初，土耳其的年度通胀率略低于预期，而月度物价增长速度也超过了预期。【原文：Turkey’s annual inflation eased slightly less than expected at the start of the year, while monthly price-growth also accelerated more than forecast.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，美国炼油商将目光投向拉美和伊拉克
item.description: 据交易商称，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发出关税警告后，美国炼油商将把目光投向拉丁美洲和中东，以取代突然变得更加昂贵的加拿大和墨西哥原油。【原文：US oil refiners will look to Latin America and the Middle East to replace suddenly more expensive Canadian and Mexican crudes following President Donald Trump’s tariff salvo, according to traders.】

item.title: 巴西莫雷拉-萨莱斯家族可能竞购法国维拉利亚公司
item.description: 巴西亿万富翁莫雷拉-萨莱斯（Moreira Salles）家族表示，它正在探索对 Verallia SA 的潜在收购要约，对这家法国包装公司的估值约为 36 亿欧元（37 亿美元）。【原文：Brazil’s billionaire Moreira Salles family said it’s exploring a potential offer for Verallia SA that would value the French packaging company at about €3.6 billion ($3.7 billion).】

item.title: 受特朗普关税威胁影响，美国石油涨幅超过全球基准油价
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布将限制美国最大的两个外国原油供应国的原油供应后，美国石油基准指数的涨幅超过了全球指数。【原文：The American oil benchmark outpaced gains in the global marker after President Donald Trump announced tariffs that will limit supplies from the US’s two biggest foreign suppliers of crude.】

item.title: 科塔克高管表示，印度减税将促进储蓄和消费
item.description: 科塔克-马恒达银行（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.）副总经理 Shanti Ekambaram 认为，印度预算案中的税收调整后，人们手中多出的现金将对经济产生 "乘数效应"，促进消费、储蓄和投资。【原文：The extra cash in the hands of people following the tax tweaks in India’s budget will have a “multiplier effect on the economy” and boost consumption, savings and investments according to Shanti Ekambaram, deputy managing director at Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.】

item.description: 包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Wall Street banks including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. think there is still plenty of money to be made buying the dollar, even after US President Donald Trump’s tariff-push sent the greenback soaring.】

欧莱雅向制药商出售 30 亿欧元赛诺菲股票
item.description: 化妆品公司欧莱雅（L'Oreal SA）将向法国制药商赛诺菲（Sanofi）出售 30 亿欧元（约合 31 亿美元）的股份，在赛诺菲的股价过去一年跑赢大盘后，欧莱雅套现了部分持股。【原文：Cosmetics company L’Oreal SA is selling a €3 billion ($3.1 billion) stake in Sanofi back to the French drugmaker, cashing in part of its holding after Sanofi’s shares outperformed the market over the past year.】

item.title: 三星电子李在镕上诉获胜，洗脱罪名
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.三星电子公司执行董事长李在镕（Jay Y. Lee）在检察官的上诉中成功地进行了辩护，这对于这家多年来一直笼罩在财务不当指控阴云下的韩国最大公司来说是向前迈出的一步。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. Executive Chairman Jay Y. Lee successfully defended against an appeal by prosecutors, a step forward for South Korea’s largest company that has remained under a years-long cloud of financial impropriety charges.】

item.title: 阿斯利康股价反弹将面临中国调查答案的考验
item.description: 本周，阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）股价的复苏将面临关键考验，与财报相比，更有可能取决于这家制药商能否解决对其中国业务的担忧。【原文：A revival in AstraZeneca Plc shares faces a key test this week, with more likely to hinge on the drugmaker’s ability to address concerns over its business in China than on its earnings report alone.】

item.title: 韩国领导人承诺采取措施缓解特朗普关税打击
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普宣布对中国、加拿大和墨西哥征收关税后，韩国代总统崔相木会见了当地出口商，并誓言为他们提供支持。【原文：South Korea’s Acting President Choi Sang-mok met with local exporters and vowed support for them following Donald Trump’s announcement of tariffs against China, Canada and Mexico.】

item.title: 俄罗斯富人将现金带回家，莫斯科房产与伦敦相媲美
item.description:

item.title: 据说沃伯格和伯克希尔接近达成 30 亿美元收购 Triumph 的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）和伯克希尔合伙公司（Berkshire Partners）正在就以约 30 亿美元（包括债务）收购飞机零部件和服务供应商凯旋集团公司（Triumph Group Inc.【原文：Warburg Pincus and Berkshire Partners are in advanced talks to acquire aircraft parts and services supplier Triumph Group Inc. for about $3 billion, including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称中国为特朗普准备贸易协议以避免关税
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，中国已准备好与特朗普政府进行贸易谈判的初步建议，其中将包括再次承诺不会让人民币贬值以支持其出口。【原文：China has prepared an initial proposal for trade talks with the Trump administration that will include a renewed pledge not to devalue the yuan to support its exports, according to the Wall Street Journal.】

item.title: 印度官员表示，印度将在资金紧张的情况下积极管理现金
item.description: 印度经济事务秘书阿杰-塞思（Ajay Seth）在接受采访时表示，印度将积极管理其现金需求，以免在银行业流动性紧张的情况下扼杀私营部门的资金。【原文：India will actively manage its cash needs so as to not choke the private sector of funds amid tight banking liquidity, Economic Affairs Secretary Ajay Seth said in an interview.】

item.title: 首席经济顾问称印度增长放缓是暂时的
item.description: 印度一位高级官员表示，印度经济增长放缓是暂时的，该国未来仍能实现更快的扩张，以实现总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）提出的未来几十年的经济目标。【原文：India’s growth slowdown is temporary and the country can still achieve faster expansion in the future to reach Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s economic goal in coming decades, a top official said.】

item.title: 花旗集团称澳大利亚将抵御全球贸易动荡
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.）的经济学家认为，即使美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对加拿大、墨西哥和中国征收关税，澳大利亚也有望继续抵御全球贸易裂痕。【原文：Australia is expected to remain resilient to global trade fractures, according to economists at Citigroup Inc., even as US President Donald Trump unleashes tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China.】

item.title: 特朗普关税令汽车、墨西哥市场股票成为亚洲股市最大输家
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发动第一波关税之后，依赖出口的亚洲股市（从日本汽车制造商到中国电子商务公司）纷纷下挫，预示着新一轮全球贸易战的开始。【原文：Asian stocks reliant on exports, ranging from Japanese carmakers to Chinese e-commerce firms, nosedived after US President Donald Trump unleashed his first wave of tariffs, signaling the beginning of a new round of global trade war.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，以太币在亚洲交易中最高下跌 26.5
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普上周末宣布征收关税后，投资者纷纷降低风险，以太币周一遭遇了近四年来的最大跌幅。【原文：Ether suffered its steepest loss in nearly four years on Monday as investors slashed risk after tariffs announced over the weekend by Donald Trump.】

item.title: 贸易战爆发前亚洲工厂活动放缓
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）于上周末挑起贸易战之前，由于需求降温，1 月份亚洲各地工厂的扩张步伐乏力。【原文：Factories across Asia expanded at a lackluster pace in January as demand cooled, ahead of a trade war that President Donald Trump kicked off on the weekend.】

item.title: 受特朗普征收 10%关税影响，香港中资股节后下跌
item.description: 春节假期结束后，在香港恢复交易的中国股市下跌，交易商正在权衡美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国征收 10%关税的举措。【原文：Chinese equities listed in Hong Kong fell as trading resumed after the Lunar New Year holiday, with traders weighing US President Donald Trump’s move to impose a 10% levy on China.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索、兰特引领新兴市场货币因特朗普关税而下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对美国一些最大的贸易伙伴征收关税后，墨西哥比索和南非兰特成为新兴市场货币暴跌的最大输家。【原文：The Mexican peso and South African rand were the biggest losers in an emerging-market currency slump after US President Donald Trump imposed tariffs on some of America’s biggest trade partners.】

item.title: 特朗普关税逼近，中国工厂活动增速再度放缓
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对中国出口产品征收关税，中国制造业活动在一月份连续第二个月意外下滑，这凸显了中国政府加大经济刺激力度的必要性。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity unexpectedly declined for a second straight month in January, underlining the need for Beijing to step up economic stimulus with Donald Trump slapping tariffs on the country’s exports.】

item.title: 软银孙正义和 OpenAI 的 Altman 将为日本人工智能事业揭幕
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）创始人孙正义（Masayoshi Son）周一将与开放人工智能（Open AI）负责人萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）在东京登台演讲，这是全球推动人工智能支持基础设施投资的一部分。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s founder Masayoshi Son is taking the stage in Tokyo on Monday with Open AI chief Sam Altman, part of a global push to spur investment in AI-supporting infrastructure.】
